Detailed Description

DMA Engine interface for the Wengxue Gao's (WG) DMA controller.

Author:
Guillermo Marcus
Version:
Revision
1.9
Date:
Date
2008-01-11 10:30:21

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DMAEngineWG::DMAEngineWG (  Driver &  driver,
unsigned int *  base0,
unsigned int *  base1,
unsigned int *  inte,
unsigned int *  ints
) 
 

Creates an instance of the DMA Engine, to interface with Wenxue's design.

Parameters:
driver The Driver to use to communicate with the driver. Needed to create DMA buffers.
base0 Pointer to the base address to access the Channel0 descriptor (DMA_DOWN).
base1 Pointer to the base address to access the Channel1 descriptor (DMA_UP).
inte Pointer to the Interrupt Enable Register (IER).
ints Pointer to the Interrupt Status Register (ISR).

Member Function Documentation

void DMAEngineWG::board2host (  const unsigned int  addr,
DMABuffer &  buf,
const unsigned int  count,
const unsigned int  offset = 0,
const bool  inc = true,
const bool  lock = true
)  [virtual]
 

Performs a DMA transaction from board to host.

Parameters:
addr The address in the board (dword address).
buf The DMA buffer in the host.
count Number of bytes to transfer.
offset Initial dword to transfer.
inc If the address in the board is incremented or not.
lock If the function waits until the transaction is complete or not.

Implements mprace::DMAEngine.

void DMAEngineWG::sendDescriptorList (  const unsigned int  addr,
const DMABuffer &  buf,
const unsigned int  count,
const unsigned int  offset,
const bool  inc,
const unsigned int  ch
)  [protected]
 

Prepares and sends a descriptor list for a DMA transaction.

Parameters:
addr The address in the board (dword address).
buf The DMA buffer in the host.
count Number of bytes to transfer.
offset Initial dword to transfer.
inc If the address in the board is incremented or not.
ch Channel to perform the transaction

void mprace::DMAEngineWG::setUseInterrupts (  bool  val  )  [inline]
 

Set the DMAEngine to use interrupts or not.

This is a global setting, and should not be change while DMA transactions are ongoing.

Parameters:
val True to use interrupts, false to poll the status.

void DMAEngineWG::waitChannel (  const unsigned int  channel  )  [inline, protected]
 

Wait for the channel to be done.

Parameters:
channel The channel number to wait for.

void DMAEngineWG::waitForInterrupt (  const unsigned int  ch  )  [inline, protected]
 

Wait the Interrupt from a given DMA channel.

Parameters:
channel The channel to modify

void DMAEngineWG::write (  const unsigned int  channel,
const DMADescriptorWG &  desc
)  [inline, protected]
 

Write a DMA Descriptor to a channel control address.

Parameters:
channel The channel number to write the descriptor to.
desc DMADescriptor to write.
